dialogue.htmlContent: hey npc, i know we've only known each other for a short while, but I really enjoy spending time with you. You're really hot, handsome, kind, and you know how to show a [pc.guy] a good time. This is hard for even me to say, but I really like you, will you be my boyfriend? I know you've had a rough life, so I don't want to force you or anything

looking at your [npc.boyfriend], you think how to treat them. you could do something spontaneous, or plan something out. you wonder if you should also bring some others along and make this a group thing?
